title: Rita Moreno Will Sit Down with ON YOUR FEET!'s Gloria & Emilio Estefan at 92Y
content: 92Y has announced that EGOT winner Rita Morenowill interview GloriaandEmilio Estefan for the upcoming eventonOctober 19. Moreno is a longtime friend of the Estefans and Emilio produced her new Spanish-language album, Una Vez…
